Intervention.evidence: comparing angiographic revascularization with the stent retriever (SR) and contact aspiration (CA) thrombectomy techniques

Objective.evidence: Objective: We report the rate and benefits of FPE in the Aspiration versus Stent Retriever (ASTER) trial.

Method_Outcome.evidence: Outcomes were compared between FPE-SR and FPE-CA patients, and between FPE and non-FPE patients.

Result_Outcome.evidence: adjusted RR for CA versus SR 0.84, 95%â€‰CI 0.54 to 1.31; p=0.44

Harms.evidence: a significantly lower rate of hemorrhagic transformation and procedural complications than in non-FPE patients.

Trial_Registration.evidence: Trial registration number: Unique identifier: NCT02523261 .
